files.name: Readme
contents: I Designed and developed a custom query language that encodes Boolean expressions to retrieve rows from databases.
I developed two parsers for the language to parse it into both .Net Lambda Expressions and custom JavaScript expression trees.
This allows user interfaces to be built on top of the JS expression trees which can then execute queries using TradingHub's .NET database cache layer.

files.name: Readme
contents: I Developed a widget that works with the JS expression trees developed for the query language to create and share database queries.
The widget allows users to generate shareable URLs which will open a saved query.
The results of queries can then be fed into a range of data displays including data grids and graphs.

files.name: About
contents: I work as a Software Engineer in London.
This website is developed in Blazor Webassembly, pretty neat!
